00018 template <typename PixelType, class ParameterType, class Kernel> 
00019 class TConvolutionProcessorComp: public iipr::TImageParamProcessorCompBase<ParameterType>
00020 {
00021 public:
00022        typedef iipr::TImageParamProcessorCompBase<ParameterType> BaseClass;
00023        typedef iipr::TLocalNeighborhood<iimg::TBitmapIterator<PixelType>, Kernel> Neighborhood;
00024 
00025 protected:           
00026        // abstract methods
00027        virtual Kernel* CreateKernel(const ParameterType* paramsPtr) = 0;
00028 
00029        // reimplemented (iipr::TImageParamProcessorCompBase<ParameterType>)
00030        virtual bool ParamProcessImage(
00031                             const ParameterType* paramsPtr,
00032                             const iimg::IBitmap& inputImage,
00033                             iimg::IBitmap& outputImage);
00034 };
00035 
00036 
00037 // reimplemented (iipr::TImageParamProcessorCompBase<ParameterType>)
00038 
00039 template <typename PixelType, class ParameterType, class Kernel> 
00040 bool TConvolutionProcessorComp<PixelType, ParameterType, Kernel>::ParamProcessImage(
00041                      const ParameterType* paramsPtr,
00042                      const iimg::IBitmap& inputImage,
00043                      iimg::IBitmap& outputImage)
00044 {
00045        if (paramsPtr == NULL){
00046               return false;
00047        }
00048 
00049        bool retVal = true;
00050 
00051        istd::TDelPtr<Kernel> filterKernelPtr(CreateKernel(paramsPtr));
00052        if (!filterKernelPtr.IsValid()){
00053               return false;
00054        }
00055 
00056        // initialize kernel with input image:
00057        filterKernelPtr->InitForBitmap(inputImage);
00058 
00059        i2d::CRectangle kernelBoundingBox = filterKernelPtr->GetBoundingBox();
00060        i2d::CRectangle bitmapRegion = i2d::CRectangle(inputImage.GetImageSize());
00061        
00062        bitmapRegion.Expand(i2d::CRectangle(
00063                             -kernelBoundingBox.GetWidth() * 0.5, 
00064                             -kernelBoundingBox.GetHeight() * 0.5,
00065                             kernelBoundingBox.GetWidth(),
00066                             kernelBoundingBox.GetHeight()));
00067 
00068        iimg::TBitmapIterator<PixelType> inputIterator(&inputImage, &bitmapRegion);
00069        iimg::TBitmapIterator<PixelType> outputIterator(&outputImage, &bitmapRegion);
00070 
00071        while (!inputIterator.AtEnd()){
00072               double outputValue = 0.0;
00073 
00074               Neighborhood neighborhood(inputIterator, *filterKernelPtr); 
00075               typename Neighborhood::Iterator neighIter = neighborhood.Begin();
00076 
00077               for (         typename Kernel::Iterator kernelIter = filterKernelPtr->Begin();
00078                                    kernelIter != filterKernelPtr->End();
00079                                    ++kernelIter){
00080                                    
00081                      outputValue += (*kernelIter).second * (*neighIter);
00082                      ++neighIter;
00083               }
00084 
00085               *outputIterator = PixelType(outputValue / filterKernelPtr->GetWeightsSum());
00086 
00087               ++inputIterator;
00088               ++outputIterator;
00089        }
00090 
00091        return retVal;
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00095 } // namespace iipr
